section.title: KDE 4 Desktop Enviroment
section.para: Default desktop environment is updated to KDE 4.5.5, the latest stable release of KDE that has been enhanced and modified for Pardus. With this release the backbone of desktop environment Plasma, the file manager (Dolphin) and desktop effects has become more stable and faster with a lot of fixes. With the new KDE desktop users can select between Default Mode, Old KDE Mode and the new Netbook Mode, optimized for small displays.

The applications which are frequently used by desktop users such as Amarok (multimedia player), Skanlite (browser interface), KTorrent (torrent interface), SMPlayer (video player) can be installed with this version
